name: HEREAFTER COMPLETE VERSION
description:
FOOLISH IS THE ONE WHO THINKS THEIR TRIALS WILL END WITH DEATH, EVEN MORE FOOLISH IS THE ONE WHO THINKS DEATH BRINGS SOLACE. 

Protagonist who was brutally murdered must proffer a confession from her killer in order to cross over to the other side. Her trials begin anew after her death. Walk alongside her in this story of betrayal, conspiracy and love…

 

 

This game contains:

  • Five different endings
  • Two romance-able characters
  • Meaningful choices (please choose carefully as the choices will reveal hidden scenes and different routes)

Warnings

  • This game contains mentions of non-consensual sexual content
  • Graphic description of violence
  •  Rating 16+ 

Contact Information :

If you face any problem or have any issues with the games you bought from us, please send us an email at zsstudiosinfo@gmail.com  . Our team will reach you immediately. 

Thank You!
